cause.description:
Although Airsoft guns are legal to by if you are over teh age of 18 it is still highly regulated. Airsoft Guns are illegal to transport over the border if it be from Canada to the U.S. or from the U.S. to Canada do to the fact that airsoft guns are replicas. Our goal is to spread the word of this fun, and exhilarating sport. Airsoft requires honesty and skill and it should be more available to minors.
1. Airsoft is a fun sport and should be more available
2. Airsoft guns should be legal to transport across the boarder
cause.mission: Is to Fully Legalize Airsoft In Canada
cause.name: Full Canadian Legalization Of Airsoft
